settings.text:
Made by co-founders Drs. Stevie Roberts DMD and Robert Johnson DMD, MD, Duo's formulation includes purifying antioxidants and nourishing botanical extracts that promote a balanced oral microbiome. We use dentist-backed nano-hydroxyapatite (nHa), a naturally-occurring compound proven to remineralize teeth as well as — or better than — fluoride, while also whitening enamel and stopping sensitivity at the source.

Free from drying SLS foaming agents and other harsh chemicals used in most toothpastes, our proprietary silky foam naturally hydrates your mouth (hydration is the secret to preventing growth of bad bacteria that cause disease and bad breath).

Formulated with leading science and natural ingredients, Duo is at the forefront of bridging oral health with systemic wellness. The mouth is the gateway to all major systems, and the oral membrane is highly permeable. That's why doctors infused toothpaste with Vitamin B12 to help patients who had trouble digesting pills, and found that it worked as well as, if not better than, traditional pills at supporting vitamin levels over time.

Many people actually struggle to absorb vitamins and supplements through the gastrointestinal tract. Duo’s toothpaste tablets allow you to absorb essential vitamins like B12 and D directly into your bloodstream as you brush (plus, you can ditch those giant horse-pill vitamins!)

1.5 billion toothpaste tubes end up as trash each year, polluting the earth with plastic that takes over 500 years to biodegrade. With Duo, you can turn a waste-heavy everyday task into a responsible choice for our planet. Simply chew the tablet to break it down, add water on you toothbrush to activate a silky foam – and then you brush the same way you always have.

Duo toothpaste tablets come in amber glass bottles that look great in your bathroom and refills arrive in compostable pouches. (We offer subscription plans with extra savings.
